record.name: SHD
record.description:
The Shd structure specifies the colors and pattern that are used for background shading.

Class and fields descriptions are quoted from Word (.doc) Binary File Format by Microsoft Corporation
record.author: Sergey Vladimirov; according to Word (.doc) Binary File Format by Microsoft Corporation.

field.name: cvFore
field.description: A COLORREF that specifies the foreground color of ipat

field.name: cvBack
field.description: A COLORREF that specifies the background color of ipat

field.name: ipat
field.description: An Ipat that specifies the pattern used for shading
